rulesStrings.li: serketistBasis ->The universe is an endless cycle of creation and destruction managed by spirits in aspects of the world around us.
serketistBasis ->A parallel universe of spirits lies next to our own. A seemingly inanimate object in this universe corresponds to an animated spirit in the other.
serketistFact ->Each spirit has an essential nature, and seeks to influence the world. Sometimes this influence is helpful, and sometimes it is harmful.
serketistProphecy->[itIsSaid] that the spirit of the great [relic0_name] will one day grant its wielder power over all spirits.
serketistProphecy->[itIsSaid] that a sleeping traveler from the stars will crash to the earth, and the spirit of the crater will wake the traveller who will raise the last tribe.
